lifecycleScripts.afterStart: npx wp-env run cli wp option update woocommerce_calc_taxes no && npx wp-env run cli wp option update woocommerce_currency USD && npx wp-env run cli wp option update woocommerce_store_address '123 Test Street' && npx wp-env run cli wp option update woocommerce_store_city 'Test City' && npx wp-env run cli wp option update woocommerce_default_country 'US:CA'
